name: gasoline_prices
field_description: Unique identifier for the series.

name: gasoline_prices
field_description: Date representing the week of the data sample

name: gasoline_prices
field_name: Weekly U.S. All Grades All Formulations Retail Gasoline Prices (Dollars per Gallon)
field_description: Target variable: Average retail prices per gallon for gasoline across all grades and formulations, reflecting the broad U.S. market.

name: gasoline_prices
field_name: Weekly U.S. All Grades Conventional Retail Gasoline Prices (Dollars per Gallon)
field_description: Average weekly retail prices for conventional gasoline across all grades, excluding reformulated blends.

name: gasoline_prices
field_name: Weekly U.S. All Grades Reformulated Retail Gasoline Prices (Dollars per Gallon)
field_description: Average weekly retail prices for reformulated gasoline, which is blended to reduce pollutants, across all grades.

name: gasoline_prices
field_name: Weekly U.S. Regular All Formulations Retail Gasoline Prices (Dollars per Gallon)
field_description: Composite average of retail prices for regular gasoline, encompassing both conventional and reformulated gasoline.

name: gasoline_prices
field_name: Weekly U.S. Regular Conventional Retail Gasoline Prices (Dollars per Gallon)
field_description: Average price of regular grade conventional gasoline, not including any reformulated gasoline components.

name: gasoline_prices
field_name: Weekly U.S. Regular Reformulated Retail Gasoline Prices (Dollars per Gallon)
field_description: Weekly average price for regular grade reformulated gasoline, specifically designed to produce fewer emissions.

name: gasoline_prices
field_name: Weekly U.S. Midgrade All Formulations Retail Gasoline Prices (Dollars per Gallon)
field_description: Combined average retail prices for midgrade gasoline, including both conventional and reformulated types.

name: gasoline_prices
field_name: Weekly U.S. Midgrade Conventional Retail Gasoline Prices (Dollars per Gallon)
field_description: Average retail price for midgrade conventional gasoline, which does not include reformulated gasoline.

name: gasoline_prices
field_name: Weekly U.S. Midgrade Reformulated Retail Gasoline Prices (Dollars per Gallon)
field_description: Average weekly price of midgrade gasoline in its reformulated variant, mixed to lower environmental impact.

name: gasoline_prices
field_name: Weekly U.S. Premium All Formulations Retail Gasoline Prices (Dollars per Gallon)
field_description: Average weekly prices for premium gasoline, covering all types including both conventional and reformulated gasoline.

name: gasoline_prices
field_name: Weekly U.S. Premium Conventional Retail Gasoline Prices (Dollars per Gallon)
field_description: Weekly retail prices for premium conventional gasoline, excluding the reformulated blend.

name: gasoline_prices
field_name: Weekly U.S. Premium Reformulated Retail Gasoline Prices (Dollars per Gallon)
field_description: Average price for premium grade reformulated gasoline, which burns cleaner than conventional blends.

name: gasoline_prices
field_name: Weekly U.S. No 2 Diesel Retail Prices (Dollars per Gallon)
field_description: Average retail price per gallon of No. 2 diesel fuel, commonly used in freight and diesel-engine vehicles.
